馵字的基本解释

馵
zhù
后左脚白色的马。

馵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》之戍切，去遇，章。］
马后足色白。亦指后足白色的马。

馵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　馵； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1434第16
【唐韻】之戍切【集韻】【韻會】朱戍切，?音注。【說文】馬後左足白也。【爾雅·䆁畜】左白馵。又膝上皆白惟馵。【詩·秦風】駕我騏馵。　又【玉篇】馬懸足也。【易·說卦傳】震爲馵足。【陸佃云】馵足蓋取其躁，故二絆其足，言制之而動。今字書䭴从馬，一絆其足。馵，二絆其足。馽，口其足。　又【集韻】朱欲切，音燭。義同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋獸】左白馵。〕　謹照原書釋獸改䆁畜。
馵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
馵字的起名意思

马后足色白。亦指后足白色的马。

Glutinous
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous
zhù
A white horse with the rear left foot.
Glutinous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhù］
["Guang Yun" cut and cut, go to meet, chapter. ]
The hind feet of the horse are white. Also refers to a horse with white hind feet.
Glutinous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　馵; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1434 Page 16
【Tang Yun】The Shuqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Zhu Shuqie,? Phonetic Note. [Said the text] The left foot of the horse is also white. 【Erya·Xiao Hu】Zuo Baifang. And there is nothing on the knees. [Poetry·Qin Feng] Drive me around.　[Jade Chapter] Horse hanging feet. 【Easy·Said Gua Chuan】shock is a feast. [Lu Dianyun] The feet are irritable, so the feet are stumbling and the words are restrained. Today's calligraphy is from the horse, and one trips its feet.馵, the second tripped his feet. It's delicious and eloquent.　[Jiyun] Zhu Yuqie, sound candle. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Erya·Shiju] Zuo Baiming. 〕　I would like to change the animal to the animal according to the original book.
